title: Stabat Mater
description:
The latin sequence "Stabat Mater", composed by Giovanni Battista Pergolesi in 1736, is performed here by three young amateur artists coming from southern Germany:

Viviana Contout, a 17 year old sopranist,
Petra Diestelkamp, her mother, an experienced singer and choir-leader, altist,
Andreas MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶lder, student of sacred music and organist of St. Ulrich (near Freiburg), organ.

The recording was done in St. Trudpert, in the former church of an old monastery, built at the place where martyr St. Trupert was killed in the 7th century.

Enjoy!
